summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6136 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 5, Sparkman & McLean's Second Addition to West Seattle, being the alley between 45th Avenue Southwest and 46th Avenue Southwest from West Charlestown Street to West Spokane Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85376, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
